anyone good with dvds, video, etc?: i used tovid to create a mpg that's supposedly compliant with standalone dvd players. how do i burn this file? just as data? or do i have to make it a video dvd format or something?
sounds like (s)vcd, just burn it as data and you should be okay
svcd is for CDs, you can't burn them to DVD. SVCD uses 44.1khz audio while dvds use 47khz.
